meanings.definition: Stop the continuous progress of an activity or process.
meanings.sent1: The loud noise interrupts my concentration while studying.
meanings.sent2: Please do not interrupt the teacher while she is speaking.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy interrupts the serious meeting by running around the room.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected phone call interrupts the peaceful silence of the evening.
meanings.sent5: The sudden rain interrupts our outdoor picnic, forcing us to seek shelter.

meanings.definition: Break the continuity of a line or surface.
meanings.sent1: The fence interrupts the smooth flow of the grass in the field.
meanings.sent2: The mountain range interrupts the horizon with its majestic peaks.
meanings.sent3: The colorful painting interrupts the plain white wall in a delightful way.
meanings.sent4: The bold font interrupts the paragraph, drawing attention to the important message.
meanings.sent5: The winding river interrupts the flat landscape, adding beauty to the scenery.
